name: COVID-19 Fund Relief
blurb: International Swaminarayan Satsang Organization is leading and coordinating the global effort with Covid-19 Relief Fund supporting families and individuals to prevent, detect, and respond to the pandemic. If you are in a financial position to do so, please consider making a donation to directly help combat the COVID-19 pandemic by visiting [issousa.org/covid-19](http://www.issousa.org/covid19)

name: Pledge for COVID-19 Service
blurb: With the intent of ensuring wellness of all humanity, we as a community organization pledge to serve in all possible manners to overcome COVID-19. See [Sankalpa Patra](/attachments/sankalpa-patra.pdf)

name: ISSO Seva Accomplishments 2018
blurb: ISSO Seva Accomplishments for 2018. A brief video summary and highlights

name: Kenya Health Camp
blurb: ISSO Seva hosted four free medical camps in different locations in Kenya from July 22nd 2018 - Aug 1st 2018. We served 5191 patients, 13,000 medical procedures were performed, 191 pints of blood were donated, 4000 food ration packs distrubuted e.t.c The video contains the highlights.

name: Uganda Medical Mission
blurb: ISSO Seva co-sponsored with Indo-Africa Charitable Society of Canada, a free primary care health camp in Lira Uganda. We served 24989 patients in 10 days covering General Practice, Pediatrics, Dental, OBGY, and Eye care. We also donated computers, food, and clothing at orphanages and schools.

name: Soup kitchen
blurb: Volunteer team in Seattle started soup kitchen service  at a  shelter for women and child in need once a month. Since then the service has been expanded to multiple soup kitchens per month.
